Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-all, python3-dask, python3-netcdf4, python3-pandas, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-scipy, python3-setuptools, python3-xarray
Description: Python implementation of selected PolSARpro functions PolSARPro is a SW for polarimetric analysis of Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data. It was originally developed in C and Tcl/Tk language. This package provides a re-implementation in Python of a selected subset of the functions of the original SW, like: * polarimetric decompositions * I/O routines * polarimetric speckle filtering
Package-List: python-polsarpro-doc deb doc optional arch=all python3-polsarpro deb python optional arch=all
